```{r}
propane <- read.csv("WeeklyPropanePricesPerGallon.csv")
names(propane) <- c("Date","Price") # rename table columns
plot(1:length(propane$Price),propane$Price,type="l",xlab="Time",ylab="Propane Price per Gallon")
```
